title: Implement event scheduler for timed script/program execution
description: Design and implement an event scheduler that can fire off events (scripts, programs) on a timed basis. Examples: polling binkd hub, running hpt scan, nightly maintenance. Requirements: JSON config in configs/, best practice scheduling, comprehensive logging.
